perturbation.original_text:
24. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement and the relationship between the parties is governed by and will be construed exclusively in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida (without regard to, and without applying, Florida conflict-of-law rules).
perturbation.changed_text:
24. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement and the relationship between the parties is governed by and will be construed in accordance with the laws of the State where franchisee is located (without regard to, and without applying, Florida conflict-of-law rules). This is subject to change based on the franchisorâ€™s discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating that the governing law is subject to change based on the franchisor's discretion. This contradicts the original clause's explicit statement that Florida law governs the agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Clear and Unambiguous Terms

perturbation.original_text: 25.2. Forum for Litigation. You and the Owners must file any suit against us, and we may file any suit against you, in the federal or state court where our principal office is located at the time the suit is filed. The parties waive all questions of personal jurisdiction and venue for the purpose of carrying out this provision.
perturbation.changed_text: 25.2. Forum for Litigation. You and the Owners may file any suit against us, and we may file any suit against you, in the federal or state court where our principal office is located at the time the suit is filed, but this is not mandatory. The parties waive all questions of personal jurisdiction and venue for the purpose of carrying out this provision, unless it is not feasible.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that any suit against the franchisor must be filed in the federal or state court where their principal office is located. The modified text introduces flexibility by stating that such filing is not mandatory and adds 'unless it is not feasible', creating uncertainty about where a suit can be filed.

perturbation.original_text: 25.4. Mutual Waiver of Jury Trial. You and we each irrevocably waive trial by jury in any litigation.
perturbation.changed_text: 25.4. Mutual Waiver of Jury Trial. You and we each waive trial by jury in any litigation, depending on the state in which the court case is filed.
perturbation.explanation: The original text contains the information that there will be a mutual waiver of jury trial, which benefits Pizza Fusion Holdings, Inc. By having the modified text contain 'depending on the state in which the court case is filed', this introduces legal contradiction, as the new text implies that it is dependent on the state law in which the court case is filed, which may not be in the best interest of Pizza Fusion Holdings, Inc.
